channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Return Of Superman Signals A Culture Shift In America
item.description: There are signs that American culture is beginning to move away from our obsession with deconstruction and cynicism — and Superman is one of them.

item.description: The protectionist agenda of national conservatives strikes me as nonsensical.

item.title: Mexicans Don’t Want Foreign Grifters To Ruin Their Home. Americans Shouldn’t Either
item.description: Wanting to protect your community from becoming unrecognizable isn't bigotry, it's patriotism.
